Class City

java.lang.Object
City
public class City extends Object
Represents a city. City is represented by its name, the date it was established, center, central station, number of residents(non negative) and number of neighborhoods(positive).

  • Constructor Details

    • City

      public City(String cityName, int dayEstablished, int monthEstablished, int yearEstablished, int centerX, int centerY, int stationX, int stationY, long numOfResidents, int noOfNeighborhoods)
      Constructor of a city. Constructs a new city with name, specified establishment date, x y coordinates of city center, x y coordinates of central station, number of residents (non negative, if negative will be set to 0), number of neighborhoods (positive, if less than 1 will be set to 1.).
      Parameters:
      cityName - The city's name
      dayEstablished - The day the city was established
      monthEstablished - The month the city was established
      yearEstablished - The year the city was established
      centerX - The x coordinate of the city's center
      centerY - The y coordinate of the city's center
      stationX - The x coordinate of the city's central station
      stationY - The y coordinate of the city's central station
      numOfResidents - number of residents
      noOfNeighborhoods - number of neighborhoods

    • City

      public City(City other)
      Copy constructor for cities. Construct a city with the same attributes as another city.
      Parameters:
      other - The City object from which to construct the new city.

      public void setNumOfResidents(long numOfResidents)
      Changes the city's number of residents. If a negative number is received, number of residents should not be changed.
      Parameters:
      numOfResidents - The city's new number of residents

    • setNumOfNeighborhoods

      Changes the city's number of neighborhoods. If a non positive number is received, number of neighborhoods should not be changed.
      Parameters:
      noOfNeighborhoods - The city's new number of neighborhoods

    • addResidents

      public boolean addResidents(long residentsUpdate)
      Add or subtract residents to this city. If number of residents becomes negative, set to zero and return false, otherwise set to new number and return true.
      Parameters:
      residentsUpdate - The change in the number of residents
      Returns:
      True if new number of residents is calculated as non negative

    • moveCentralStation

      public void moveCentralStation(int deltaX, int deltaY)
      Move the central station location. If the new coordinates are not in the first quadrant, the location will not be changed.
      Parameters:
      deltaX - The change in the station's x location
      deltaY - The change in the station's y location

    • distanceBetweenCenterAndStation

      public double distanceBetweenCenterAndStation()
      Calculate the distance between the city center and the central station.
      Returns:
      double representing the distance between the city center and the central station

    • newCity

      public City newCity(String newCityName, int dX, int dY)
      Returns a new city with a new name, established date which is a day after this city and a City center location dX and dY away from this city, with 0 residents and 1 neighborhood. If the new location of the city center or of the central station is not in the first quadrant, the locations will be the same as this city's locations.
      Parameters:
      newCityName - the new city's name
      dX - the x difference from this city's location
      dY - the y difference from this city's location
      Returns:
      a new city

    • cityEstablishedBetweenDates

      public boolean cityEstablishedBetweenDates(Date date1, Date date2)
      Check if the city establish date is between two given dates (including these dates). the given dates are not necessarily in order
      Parameters:
      date1 - the first given date
      date2 - the second given date
      Returns:
      true if the city establish date is between the two given dates

    • establishmentDateDiff

      public int establishmentDateDiff(City other)
      This method calculates the difference in days between the establishment date of this city and the city given as a parameter
      Parameters:
      other - the city given as a parameter to find the difference
      Returns:
      the number of days differ between this city establishment date to the other city establishment date
